_header: Of truth giveth light again blindness of unk[indness]
_description: Characteristics of youth — three lines possibly rhyming

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
of trewthe ȝeuyth lyȝt a geyn blyndnesse of vnk[ ]of power
                    ȝeuyth myȝt a geyn seknesse of synful [ ]of godenesse
                    rewlyȝt a ryȝte on rewylle ageyn wikid [ ]
BodLatTheD1.Note: Ends of lines lost through damage to folio.
